trans-unit.source: Contains a single configuration tag remapping statement.
trans-unit.target: 包含單一組態標記重新對應的陳述式。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo> class allows you to remap the types of tags at compile time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo>類別可讓您在編譯時期重新對應的標記類型。

trans-unit.source: This remapping causes the mapped type to be used in place of the original tag type for all pages and controls in the ASP.NET application in the scope of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 此重新對應會使對應的型別，用於取代原始的標記型別之所有頁面和 ASP.NET 中的應用程式組態檔的範圍中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapCollection> class allows you to programmatically access and modify the `tagMapping` subsection of the `pages` section of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapCollection>類別可讓您以程式設計方式存取和修改`tagMapping`小節的`pages`組態檔區段。

trans-unit.source: Within the `tagMappings` subsection, you can add and remove mappings between tag types by specifying the fully qualified strong names of the types.
trans-unit.target: 內`tagMappings`子區段，您可以加入和移除指定型別的完整格式的強式名稱的標記類型之間的對應。

trans-unit.source: Unlike other attributes and collections in the `pages` section, tag remapping has no matching ASP.NET page directive.
trans-unit.target: 不同於其他屬性和集合的`pages` 區段中，重新對應標記有不相符的 ASP.NET 網頁指示詞。

trans-unit.source: The following configuration file excerpt shows how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列組態檔摘錄示範如何以宣告方式指定的數個屬性的值<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapCollection> class to programmatically modify tag-mapping settings.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapCollection>類別以程式設計方式修改標記對應設定。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection>類別。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the type for the tag that is being remapped.
trans-unit.target: 要重新對應之標記的型別完整名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the type to which the tag is remapped, along with the supporting details.
trans-unit.target: 標記要重新對應至的型別名稱，連同支援的詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo" /> class based on the passed property values.
trans-unit.target: 根據已傳遞的屬性值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection>類別。

trans-unit.source: Object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Compares this instance to another object.
trans-unit.target: 比較這個執行個體和另一個物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the objects are identical; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件相同，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash value for the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前執行個體的雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: A hash value for the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 目前執行個體的雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the type to which the tag is remapped.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定標記要重新對應之型別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the type to which the tag is remapped.
trans-unit.target: 標記要重新對應之型別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串。

trans-unit.source: Tag remapping occurs at compile time.
trans-unit.target: 會發生編譯時期標記重新對應。

trans-unit.source: This remapping causes the mapped type (specified by the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo.MappedTagType%2A> property) to be used in place of the original tag type (specified by the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo.TagType%2A> property) for all pages and controls in the ASP.NET application in the scope of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 此重新對應會使對應的型別 (所指定<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo.MappedTagType%2A>屬性) 來取代原始的標記型別 (所指定<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo.TagType%2A>屬性) 所有的網頁和 ASP.NET 中的應用程式組態檔的範圍中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: An empty string value for this property will cause the configuration system to throw an exception when the object is serialized.
trans-unit.target: 空字串值，這個屬性會導致組態系統，將物件序列化時所擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo.MappedTagType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo.MappedTagType%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: It is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection> type.
trans-unit.target: 它是一個較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection>型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the original type for the tag that is being remapped.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要重新對應之標記的原始型別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the original type for the tag that is being remapped.
trans-unit.target: 要重新對應之標記的原始型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: Tag remapping occurs at compile time.
trans-unit.target: 會發生編譯時期標記重新對應。

trans-unit.source: This remapping causes the mapped type (specified by the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo.MappedTagType%2A> property) to be used in place of the original tag type (specified by the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo.TagType%2A> property) for all pages and controls in the ASP.NET application in the scope of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 此重新對應會使對應的型別 (所指定<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo.MappedTagType%2A>屬性) 來取代原始的標記型別 (所指定<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo.TagType%2A>屬性) 所有的網頁和 ASP.NET 中的應用程式組態檔的範圍中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: An empty string value for this property will cause the configuration system to throw an exception when the object is serialized.
trans-unit.target: 空字串值，這個屬性會導致組態系統，將物件序列化時所擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo.TagType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo.TagType%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection>類別。
